articles.author: jakemeth
articles.title: To avoid the next coronavirus, we need a vaccine before the outbreak
articles.description: Commentary: We need to develop vaccines before deadly outbreaks of coronavirus (which causes COVID-19) or the flu occur.

articles.author: John Buysse
articles.title: One way the wealthy hope to avoid coronavirus? Private jets
articles.description: “They’re not willing to share the cabin with other people.”

articles.author: Don Reisinger
articles.title: Health questions swirled around Apple this week, from coronavirus to a heart study partnership
articles.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook thinks Coronavirus is under control in China, but it's still causing plenty of speculation about the future of the iPhone. Meanwhile, Apple is holding another health study and had its shareholder meeting this week.

articles.author: Naomi Xu Elegant
articles.title: Before the new coronavirus, there was SARS and MERS: Do epidemics ever really end?
articles.description: The instinct that epidemics are limited to one point in time is misleading, experts say.

articles.author: Jaclyn Gallucci
articles.title: Trump says additional coronavirus cases ‘likely,’ bans travel to U.S. from Iran
articles.description: The U.S. is banning travel to Iran in response to the outbreak of the new coronavirus and elevating travel warnings to regions of Italy and South Korea. Vice President Mike Pence announced the new restrictions and warnings as President Donald Trump said 22 pe…
